goal: Generate code to solve programming problems

tasks.name: Planning
tasks.description: Create a detailed plan for code generation

inputs.name: problem
inputs.description: Description of the problem to be solved

outputs.name: plan
outputs.description: Detailed plan with steps, components, and architecture

tasks.prompt:
Your task is to create a detailed implementation plan for the given problem.

Problem: {problem}

Please provide a comprehensive implementation plan including:
1. Problem breakdown
2. Algorithm or approach selection
3. Implementation steps
4. Potential edge cases and solutions

inputs.name: problem
inputs.description: Description of the problem to be solved

inputs.name: plan
inputs.description: Detailed implementation plan from the Planning phase
